Html:
Hello,

I am pretty new to NAudio. I am trying to figure out if NAudio can help me read notes, timing between notes and change the tempo of .mid file. I am using C# so that shouldn't be a problem. The important thing for me is to change the tempo .mid file at realtime.

Thanks for your help!

NAudio can read MIDI files, and you can find the tempo event and change it. You could even insert other tempo changes into a file. However, I am not quite sure what you mean by changing the tempo in realtime. That is the job of a sequencer.
